014package org.jdbi.v3.jpa.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
018import java.lang.reflect.Method;
019import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
020import java.lang.reflect.Type;
021
022import org.jdbi.v3.jpa.BindJpa;
023import org.jdbi.v3.jpa.EntityMemberAccessException;
024import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementCustomizerFactory;
025import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementParameterCustomizer;
026
027public class BindJpaFactory implements SqlStatementCustomizerFactory {
028    @Override
029    public SqlStatementParameterCustomizer createForParameter(Annotation annotation,
030                                                              Class<?> sqlObjectType,
031                                                              Method method,
032                                                              Parameter param,
033                                                              int index,
034                                                              Type type) {
035        BindJpa bind = (BindJpa) annotation;
036        final String prefix;
037        if (bind.value().isEmpty()) {
038            prefix = "";
039        } else {
040            prefix = bind.value() + ".";
041        }
042        return (stmt, arg) -> {
043            JpaClass<?> jpaClass = JpaClass.get(arg.getClass());
044            for (JpaMember member : jpaClass.members()) {
045                stmt.bindByType(
046                        prefix + member.getColumnName(),
047                        readMember(arg, member),
048                        member.getQualifiedType());
049            }
050        };
051    }
052
053    private static Object readMember(Object entity, JpaMember member) {
054        try {
055            return member.read(entity);
056        } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
057            String message = String.format(
058                    "Unable to access property value for column %s",
059                    member.getColumnName());
060            throw new EntityMemberAccessException(message, e);
061        } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
062            String message = String.format(
063                    "Exception thrown in accessor method for column %s",
064                    member.getColumnName());
065            throw new EntityMemberAccessException(message, e);
066        }
067    }
068}
